section.heading: Duration of Task Force.
section.text: The Task Force shall complete its study and submit its report to the Council and Mayor no later than February 28, 2011.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 6093 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).
